item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: May 20, 2023 Today's Verse 1 John 2:24–25 [24] Let what you heard from the beginning abide in you. If what you heard from the beginning abides in you, then you too will abide in the Son and in the Father. [25] And this is the promise that he made to us—eternal life. Today's Memory Verse 1 John 4:7-8 - Beloved, let us love one another, for love is from God, and whoever loves has been born of God and knows God.
